label: A2BC2D4_hP18_194_f_a_cd_ef-001
title: OP4-LiNaCo$_{2}$O$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
The Li (2a) site is 74\% occupied, the Na (2c) site 39\%, and Na (2d) 23\%. 
 This structure was used by (Yabuuchi, 2013) to prepare \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hP8_186_b_b_ab-001}{O2-LiCoO$_{2}$}, O3-LiCoO$_{2}$ in the \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hR4_166_a_b_c-009}{$\alpha$-NaFeO$_{2}$ structure}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC2_hP16_186_ab_ab_a3b-001}{O4-LiCoO$_{2}$}.
